title: Test. Order. Ride. – Your Chance to Experience Moots Titanium
content:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to ride one of the best titanium bikes in the world? Now’s your opportunity. With Moots Test. Order. Ride., you can experience our legendary craftsmanship firsthand before making your dream bike a reality.

Why Moots?

At Moots, we’ve been handcrafting premium titanium bicycles in Steamboat Springs, Colorado, since 1981. Our bikes are engineered for performance, durability, and the ultimate ride experience—whether you're crushing gravel, chasing KOMs on the road, or tackling technical trails.

Now, we’re giving you a firsthand opportunity to feel the difference with our Test. Order. Ride. program. Here’s how it works:

TEST – Ride Before You Commit

The best way to understand a Moots is to ride one. Visit a Moots dealer or attend a demo event to experience our world-class titanium bikes. From the first pedal stroke, you’ll notice the buttery-smooth ride, impeccable handling, and incredible responsiveness that only Moots titanium can offer.

ORDER – Customize Your Dream Bike

Once you’ve fallen in love with the ride, it’s time to make it yours. Work with our expert team to select your perfect build—from frame size to component choices and custom finishes. Whether you’re looking for an ultra-light road racer, a gravel adventure machine, or a do-it-all endurance bike, we’ll help you dial in the perfect setup.

RIDE – The Adventure Begins

Once your handcrafted Moots is delivered, the real journey begins. Whether you’re tackling epic mountain climbs, riding endless backroads, or carving through technical terrain, your Moots is built for wherever your adventure takes you. With the strength, longevity, and ride quality of titanium, this is a bike that will stay with you for a lifetime.

There’s no substitute for experiencing a Moots in person. Find a dealer near you or schedule a test ride today. Discover the titanium difference—engineered for the long haul, built to perform, and ready to take you places.
author: Elizabeth Reeder
